Families return to their flooded homes in Dunedin, more may be red-stickered over coming days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/families-return-to-their-flooded-homes-in-dunedin-more-may-be-red-stickered-over-coming-days/P7OIHFJ3HFA5BD4O7AA7LG4OK4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/families-return-to-their-flooded-homes-in-dunedin-more-may-be-red-stickered-over-coming-days/P7OIHFJ3HFA5BD4O7AA7LG4OK4/ Ben TomsettAs the flood waters recede, the clean up begins. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 05:19:47 +0000 More than 70 Dunedin residents have had to evacuate as heavy rain lashed the region. Photo / George Heard
Gong recipient Davinder Singh Rahal who owes millions to creditors boasts of $8m in assets, claims he was threatened by gang member https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/indian-gong-recipient-who-owes-millions-to-creditors-boasts-of-8m-in-assets-claims-he-was-threatened-by-帮派成员/CVBVZHEECRCWBLWHHWZEJQKO3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/indian-gong-recipient-who-owes-millions-to-creditors-boasts-of-8m-in-assets-claims-he-was-threatened-by-帮派成员/CVBVZHEECRCWBLWHHWZEJQKO3Q/ Lane NicholsSouth Auckland businessman faces alleged gang threat amid financial scandal. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Queen's Service Medal recipient Davinder Rahal's company is in liquidation owing $4 million and a finance company is chasing him for $180,000 owed on luxury 2015 Rolls Royce Ghost.
Pig hunters report seeing missing Marokopa father Tom Phillips and children https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pig-hunters-report-seeing-missing-marokopa-father-tom-phillips-and-children/ML26WGKE7VCLXKCLJB3ERE4CTQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pig-hunters-report-seeing-missing-marokopa-father-tom-phillips-and-children/ML26WGKE7VCLXKCLJB3ERE4CTQ/ Raphael FranksTwo helicopters have been sweeping the Marokopa area today. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 04:22:13 +0000 A group of pig hunters reported seeing Phillips and his children Jayda, Ember and Maverick in the bush on Thursday.
Tararua District residents march against toll proposal on Manawatu-Tararua highway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/tararua-news/tararua-district-residents-march-against-toll-proposal-on-manawatu-tararua-highway/LCN7GQSCPJAQJG66WFKVJOYOKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/tararua-news/tararua-district-residents-march-against-toll-proposal-on-manawatu-tararua-highway/LCN7GQSCPJAQJG66WFKVJOYOKM/ Leanne WarrThe voices of protest could be heard on the streets of Woodville.Sat, 05 Oct 2024 04:09:05 +0000 Brent Barrett from Palmerston North City Council with Tararua District mayor Tracey Collis before the hīkoi to protest the proposed toll. The signs opposing the proposal have been put up around the Tararua District making the message very clear.
